overview: Our past encounters and previous lovers will always be part of us. Every memory, sexual experience and intimate fantasy has made us who we are today. Now its just the two of us and those thoughts become a blur as I Fade Into You. Anjali Kara directs an intense couple friendly series of erotic vignettes for The Daring Media Group. Featuring a host of stunning performers for you're viewing pleasure.
title: Fade Into You
